StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SaveWaiverPackage]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @WaiverPackageID uniqueiden..er, @LeadID uniqueiden..er, @WaiverPackageStatusID int, @RssReviewWaiverPackageReviewID uniqueiden..er, @RsReviewWaiverPackageReviewID uniqueiden..er, @RegionReviewWaiverPackageReviewID uniqueiden..er, @McrcReviewWaiverPackageReviewID uniqueiden..er, @TFRSNumber varchar(15), @RecruiterReviewWaiverPackageReviewID uniqueiden..er, @WaiverPackageTypeID int, @Date date.me ) AS BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION
IF EXISTS(SELECT WaiverPackageID FROM [dbo].[WaiverPackage] WHERE [WaiverPackageID] = @WaiverPackageID) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[WaiverPackage] SET [WaiverPackageID] = @WaiverPackageID, [LeadID] = @LeadID, [WaiverPackageStatusID] = @WaiverPackageStatusID, [RssReviewWaiverPackageReviewID] = @RssReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, [RsReviewWaiverPackageReviewID] = @RsReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, [RegionReviewWaiverPackageReviewID] = @RegionReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, [McrcReviewWaiverPackageReviewID]= @McrcReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, [TFRSNumber] = @TFRSNumber, [RecruiterReviewWaiverPackageReviewID] = @RecruiterReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, [WaiverPackageTypeID] = @WaiverPackageTypeID, [Date] = @Date WHERE [WaiverPackageID] = @WaiverPackageID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[WaiverPackage] ( [WaiverPackageID], [LeadID], [WaiverPackageStatusID], [RssReviewWaiverPackageReviewID], [RsReviewWaiverPackageReviewID], [RegionReviewWaiverPackageReviewID], [McrcReviewWaiverPackageReviewID], [TFRSNumber], [RecruiterReviewWaiverPackageReviewID], [WaiverPackageTypeID], [Date] ) VALUES ( @WaiverPackageID, @LeadID, @WaiverPackageStatusID, @RssReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, @RsReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, @RegionReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, @McrcReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, @TFRSNumber, @RecruiterReviewWaiverPackageReviewID, @WaiverPackageTypeID, @Date )
END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully. COMMIT TRANSACTION END
